channel.title: I cant remember how to change starting items
channel.description: lol i cant seem to remember how to change the items u start with plz help

item.title: I cant remember how to change starting items
item.dc:creator: @moparscape_forum_guy moparscape forum guy
item.description:
@moparscape_forum_guy wrote:

If u dont want a helmet it will look like this:

playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1;

Read full topic
item.source: I cant remember how to change starting items

item.title: I cant remember how to change starting items
item.dc:creator: @dooleyz dooleyz
item.description:
@dooleyz wrote:

if u want nothing it would be like

// Giving the player an unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerChest] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerLegs] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerHands] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerFeet] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerRing] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;

Read full topic

item.title: I cant remember how to change starting items
item.dc:creator: @moparscape_forum_guy moparscape forum guy
item.description:
@moparscape_forum_guy wrote:

Okay open player.java and search // Giving the player an unique look
And Change the ids.
It may look like this:

// Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat] = 1040; playerEquipment[playerCape] = 1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 1725; playerEquipment[playerChest] = 3481; playerEquipment[playerShield] = 3488; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = 3483; playerEquipment[playerHands] = 2922; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 2914; playerEquipment[playerRing] = 2552; playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 4587;
The numbers r the id of the item

Read full topic
item.source: I cant remember how to change starting items
